name: Jelly Jump
description:
Jelly Jump is an isometric puzzle game set in outer space where the character is jelly.
The player's task is to collect all points.
Platforms have their durability, when it drops to 0 you can't use it, think about every move!
Use the power of your brain and complete all stages

Key features:
- 50 levels
- cute isometric pixel art
- hard and tricky levels
